mapper.select: /* FaqDao.getFaq */ SELECT CLID, FAQID, TITLE, USER_SE_CD, CNTNTS, ORD, USE_YN, UPDT_DT, REG_DT FROM TB_FAQ WHERE FAQID = #{faqid}
mapper.update: /* FaqDao.updateFaq */ UPDATE TB_FAQ SET CLID = #{clid}, USER_SE_CD = #{user_se_cd}, TITLE = #{title}, CNTNTS = #{cntnts}, ORD = #{ord}, USE_YN = #{use_yn}, UPDT_DT = NOW(), UPDTUSERID = #{user.userid} WHERE 1=1 AND FAQID = #{faqid}
